column2: that had kept the inn there
column4: for years beyond reckoning. The innkeeper at the time of the [[War of the Ring]] was [[Barliman Butterbur]].<ref>{{FR|I9}}</ref>

column1: '''2011: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]'':'''
:The family is mentioned by Barliman Butterbur
column2: who tells the player that the Prancing Pony has been in possesion of the Butterbur family for many generations.<ref>[[The Lord of the Rings: War in the North]]

column1: Butterbur ([[wikipedia:Common Butterbur|Petasites vulgaris]]) is a fleshy plant with a heavy flower-head on a thick stalk
column2: and very large leaves. It contains the element 'butter' also found in English place-names and surnames.<ref name="Nomen">{{HM|N}}
